verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; And all that is <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H6944>me<s%>, bless his holy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, And <S%H7911>forget<s%> not all his <S%H1576>benefits<s%>:
Who <S%H5545>forgiveth<s%> all thine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>; Who <S%H7495>healeth<s%> all thy <S%H8463>diseases<s%>;
Who <S%H1350>redeemeth<s%> thy <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>destruction<s%>; Who <S%H5849>crowneth<s%> thee with <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>;
Who <S%H7646>satisfieth<s%> thy <S%H5716>desire<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5271>things<s%>, So that thy youth is renewed like the <S%H2318>eagle<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H6213>executeth<s%> <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>acts<s%>, And judgments for all that are <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>.
He made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, His <S%H5949>doings<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.
He will not <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7378>chide<s%>; Neither will he <S%H5201>keep<s%> his anger for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
He hath not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us after our <S%H2399>sins<s%>, Nor <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> us after our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are high <S%H1361>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, So <S%H1396>great<s%> is his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> toward them that fear <S%H3373>him<s%>.
As far <S%H7368>as<s%> the <S%H4217>east<s%> is from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, So far hath he <S%H7368>removed<s%> our transgressions from <S%H6588>us<s%>.
Like as a <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7355>pitieth<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%>, So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7355>pitieth<s%> them that fear <S%H3373>him<s%>.
For he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> our <S%H3336>frame<s%>; He <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> that we are <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
As for <S%H582>man<s%>, his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as <S%H2682>grass<s%>; As a <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, so he <S%H6692>flourisheth<s%>.
For the <S%H7307>wind<s%> passeth <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H4725>it<s%>, and it is gone; And the place thereof shall know it no <S%H5234>more<s%>.

But the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> upon them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H6666>him<s%>, And his righteousness unto <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children<s%>;
To such as <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, And to those that <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H6490>precepts<s%> to do <S%H6213>them<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H3559>established<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; And his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> ruleth over <S%H4910>all<s%>.

Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye his <S%H4397>angels<s%>, That are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>strength<s%>, that <S%H6213>fulfil<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, <S%H8085>Hearkening<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye his <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Ye <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of <S%H6213>his<s%>, that do his <S%H7522>pleasure<s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye his <S%H4639>works<s%>, In all <S%H4725>places<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>: <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
